name: Silver Knight
description: Silver Knight is a unique isometric mini-RPG with randomized enemy spawn placement that offers a challenging new experience each time you play. Any second can become your last in this dangerous land. Think twice before making your move â€” lives are extremely hard to come by in these parts.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: CPU Pentium 3, 800 Mhz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Video Any 3D capable card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or Athlon 64 X2 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: The game looks great! If you like 320x240. How do I make it bigger resolution?
